title: Urban Mining by Syed Adil Abbas - Muscat Daily
summary: The article highlights the growing need for urban mining to address the rising demand for raw materials used in green energy technologies like wind turbines and solar panels. As the demand for these materials increases, the mining industry is turning towards urban mining facilities to extract reusable raw materials from discarded electronics. This approach promotes a circular economy model, ensuring a sustainable supply of essential metals for green energy production and reducing reliance on traditional mining practices.
greenwashing: The article does not mention any greenwashing practices.
